se.story: You are standing at a crossroad, there is a way to left; a Road to right and you could move on straight ahead
While laying in your prison the door unlocks with a soft click
se.optionNeg: You roll around and continue to sleep

se.story: A Pokémon appears before you ready to be catches
You find a Lotto ticket with 6 correct numbers!!!
se.optionNeg: Hmmm... *checks Wallet* I still have 10 bucks, I’m fine.

se.story: Your letter to Hogwarts just arrived
You start rolling, down a hill
You wake up in a cabin on a ship.
se.optionNeg: You are the Captain of this ship and you order yourself to walk the plank.

se.story: You find yourself playing a Text adventure where there’s always only one answer
se.optionNeg: I love having no options (No analysis paralysis for me 😊)
